author: scoffie4056
content: is there an API to query the whistleblowing rewards to validators on the consensus layer?

author: nflaig
content: the whistleblower itself is not rewarded, only the block proposer including the slashing in their block, see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/issues/437 for more details
